title: Man Exposes Himself at North Haven Starbucks
content:
NORTH HAVEN, Conn. (WTNH) – Some Starbucks customers got coffee and a show in North Haven.  Police say a man exposed himself to three women.  It happened last week in the parking lot of the Starbucks on Washington Avenue.  Police say the three victims left Starbucks and were getting into their car.  That’s when the suspect backed his car into the adjacent parking space.  Then the victims noticed his genitalia was exposed.  That’s when one of them called police and the suspect took off. 
 
The suspect is described as a white male, 50-55 years old.  Police say he’s got a medium build and “salt and pepper” hair with a crew cut.  After the flashing incidents, he took off in what’s believed to be a gray 2004 Hyundai Sonata.  It’s got a bike rack attached to the trunk/rear view mirror area of the car.
